xml.data:
Home » 5V Parivārapāḷi » 1 Bhikkhuvibhaṅga » 1.1 Paṭhamabhāga » 1.1.1 Katthapaññattivāra » 1.1.1.7 Sekhiyakaṇḍa
1.1.1.7.5 Kabaḷavagga
Bhikkhuvibhaṅga
Paṭhamabhāga
Katthapaññattivāra
Sekhiyakaṇḍa
Kabaḷavagga
154.
283Anādariyaṃ paṭicca anāhaṭe kabaḷe mukhadvāraṃ vivarantassa dukkaṭaṃ…pe…  ekā paññatti. Ekena samuṭṭhānena samuṭṭhāti—  kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na vācato…pe… . (1)
284Anādariyaṃ paṭicca bhuñjamānena sabbaṃ hatthaṃ mukhe pakkhipantassa dukkaṭaṃ…pe…  ekā paññatti. Ekena samuṭṭhānena samuṭṭhāti—  kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na vācato…pe… . (2)
285Anādariyaṃ paṭicca sakabaḷena mukhena byāharantassa dukkaṭaṃ kattha paññattanti? Sāvatthiyaṃ paññattaṃ. Kaṃ ārabbhāti? Chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha. Kismiṃ vatthusminti? Chabbaggiyā bhikkhū sakabaḷena mukhena byāhariṃsu, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ. Ekā paññatti. Channaṃ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṃ ekena samuṭṭhānena samuṭṭhāti—  kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti…pe… . (3)
286Anādariyaṃ paṭicca piṇḍukkhepakaṃ bhuñjantassa dukkaṭaṃ…pe…  ekā paññatti. Ekena samuṭṭhānena samuṭṭhāti—  kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na vācato…pe… . (4)
287Anādariyaṃ paṭicca kabaḷāvacchedakaṃ bhuñjantassa dukkaṭaṃ…pe…  ekā paññatti. Ekena samuṭṭhānena samuṭṭhāti—  kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na vācato…pe… . (5)
288Anādariyaṃ paṭicca avagaṇḍakārakaṃ bhuñjantassa dukkaṭaṃ…pe…  ekā paññatti. Ekena samuṭṭhānena samuṭṭhāti—  kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na vācato…pe… . (6)
289Anādariyaṃ paṭicca hatthaniddhunakaṃ bhuñjantassa dukkaṭaṃ…pe…  ekā paññatti. Ekena samuṭṭhānena samuṭṭhāti—  kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na vācato…pe… . (7)
290Anādariyaṃ paṭicca sitthāvakārakaṃ bhuñjantassa dukkaṭaṃ…pe…  ekā paññatti. Ekena samuṭṭhānena samuṭṭhāti—  kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na vācato…pe… . (8)
291Anādariyaṃ paṭicca jivhānicchārakaṃ bhuñjantassa dukkaṭaṃ…pe…  ekā paññatti. Ekena samuṭṭhānena samuṭṭhāti—  kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na vācato…pe… . (9)
292Anādariyaṃ paṭicca capucapukārakaṃ bhuñjantassa dukkaṭaṃ…pe…  ekā paññatti. Ekena samuṭṭhānena samuṭṭhāti—  kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na vācato…pe… . (10)
293Kabaḷavaggo pañcamo.
